news.content: Received the Excellent Intern Award during my internship at Huawei Hong Kong Research Center (HKRC), Fermat Lab.
news.content_zh: 在华为香港研究中心（HKRC）Fermat Lab 实习期间，获评优秀实习生。

news.content: Started a Research Internship at Huawei Hong Kong Research Center (HKRC), Fermat Lab (Huawei 2012 Labs), focusing on LLM-related mathematical reasoning data generation.
news.content_zh: 开始在华为香港研究中心（HKRC）Fermat Lab（华为 2012 实验室）担任研究实习生，主要从事 LLM 数学推理相关数据构建工作。

news.content: I will attend ACM MM 2024 in Melbourne, Australia. Welcome to have a chat with me at the conference!
news.content_zh: 将参加在澳大利亚墨尔本举办的 ACM MM 2024，欢迎在会场交流。

news.content: One paper has been accepted by ACM MM 2024!
news.content_zh: 一篇论文被 ACM MM 2024 录用。

news.content: One paper has been accepted by ACL 2024!
news.content_zh: 一篇论文被 ACL 2024 录用。

news.content: One paper has been accepted by EMNLP 2023!
news.content_zh: 一篇论文被 EMNLP 2023 录用。

news.content: One paper has been accepted by ACL 2023 Findings!
news.content_zh: 一篇论文被 ACL 2023 Findings 录用。

news.content: One paper has been accepted by AAAI 2023!
news.content_zh: 一篇论文被 AAAI 2023 录用。
